game.name: Drone Crash Course
game.shortDescription: 드론 충돌 과정은 드론을 제어하고 어려운 테스트를 통과하는 흥미로운 시뮬레이터입니다. 장애물을 피하고 실제 무인 항공기 조종사가 될 탐색 마크를 따라 시험을!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drone crash course - Being a pilot of a controlled drone is not easy. Having decided to master this profession, you sign up for training and attend classes for a whole year .. and now the day of the final exam has come!

reviewHighlights.text: This game of my childhood, when I didn’t have a good phone, pc and internet yet, I always played a similar game on my phone, so it’s so much for me. I...
In this game you can feel the real heat of passion, true emotions. The dynamics allow you to pass the game very quickly, so it is probably suitable fo...
